channel.title: How do I spawn Objects? [Such as a bank...]
channel.description:
I'm on a 317 Delta source!
I want to know how to add objects like bank booths or bank people to my server. Also stalls for thieving would be cool. Please help.

item.title: How do I spawn Objects? [Such as a bank...]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

find your createnewobjects method in your Client class.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I spawn Objects? [Such as a bank...]

item.title: How do I spawn Objects? [Such as a bank...]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

If it your server is delta based you go to client.java
Search for makeGlobalObject
u will see a whole bunch of lines somewhat like this: makeGlobalObject(2724, 3488, 409, -3, 10)
makeGlobalObject(x coord, y coord, object ID, direction(0,1,2,3,-1,-2,-3), leave as 10

Read full topic
item.source: How do I spawn Objects? [Such as a bank...]
